title: Mizugi Kanojo The Animation
synopsis: The story begins with a pair of young lovers, the busty Mizuho-chan, and the well endowed Hiro-kun. One night Hiro suggests that Mizuho should try swimming to get in shape. He even offers to coach her after hours at the pool where he works since she can't swim very well. Mizuho's new workout plan turns out to be much more exciting than expected...
staff: [['Tatsumi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sawayama, Shinichiro', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Katakiri, Rekka', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['bermei.inazawa', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
